duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop user stories and to-be process flows to support the design and development of Salesforce solutions for clients.
Collaborate with team members to design a solution that meets client’s business requirements and fulfills user stories.
Complete the configuration for user stories within Salesforce.
Collaborate with developers to test and verify that solutions meet the business requirements.
Participate in key meetings with clients including requirements sessions, system demos, user acceptance testing, and end user training.
Understand user requirements and translate them into technical specifications.
